author: By JULIE WATSON and AMY TAXIN Associated Press
title: Lawyers, judges push to close immigration courts amid virus
description: SAN DIEGO (AP) — Immigration attorneys have sported swim goggles and masks borrowed from friends to meet with clients in detention centers. Masked judges are stocking their cramped courtrooms with hand sanitizer for hearings they want to do by phone.
content:
